title: Early 2020 Top-10 starting pitchers
text:
In this week’s Rotoworld Baseball Podcast, D.J. Short and Drew Silva unveil their early 2020 top-10 starting pitcher rankings. They also break down the latest news, including injuries to George Springer and Craig Kimbrel as well as Robinson Cano's surprising return. D.J. also goes over some weekend streaming options in fantasy leagues.

Please rate and subscribe if you enjoy what you're hearing. You can contact the show at rotoworldbaseballpod@gmail.com or on Twitter via @drewsilv or @djshort.
